code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MusicPlayer=_ref=>{let{currentSong,isPlaying,onPlayPause,onNext,onPrevious}=_ref;const audioRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{if(isPlaying){audioRef.current.play();}else{audioRef.current.pause();}},[isPlaying,currentSong]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"music-player",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:currentSong?currentSong.title:'No song selected'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:currentSong?currentSong.artist.name:''}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("audio",{ref:audioRef,src:currentSong?currentSong.preview:''}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onPrevious,children:"Previous"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onPlayPause,children:isPlaying?'Pause':'Play'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onNext,children:"Next"})]})]});};export default MusicPlayer;
